Sklik API

Client library for the API exposed by Seznam's Sklik PPC advertising system.

Features

Python module

Python wrapper around the XML-RPC API. Start developing apps without bothering with parsing protocol messages.

Free yourself from the Sklik client portal

Manage your campaigns, ads, keywords and conversions easily from within your applications.

Generate reports

Get access to your statistics and generate custom reports.

Overview

Sklik.cz is a pay-per-click advertising system operated by Seznam.cz. We provide a Python module for easier access to the Sklik.cz API.

The Sklik.cz API documentation can be found at http://api.sklik.cz/

About Seznam Seznam Developers (Czech only) @SeznamVyvojari (Czech only)
